vision.identity: I am a builder. I take complex problems in the physical world ‚Äî energy, infrastructure, supply chains ‚Äî and make them legible through data. I charge what I'm worth because the work matters. I move with calm confidence and full speed.
lifestyle: Wake up at 5am with energy, not anxiety
Greek God physique, daily training is religion
In a relationship with someone I respect and who respects me
Connected to family ‚Äî Mitchell, half-sister, dad
Known in the energy data space ‚Äî people come to ME
No invisible weight. Inbox zero. On top of everything.
vision.feeling: Grounded. Abundant. Clear. Like I earned every bit of it and I'm just getting started.

goals.title: Financial Freedom Through Prospector Labs

Send 10 cold emails to PE firms (LS Power, ECP, ArcLight, Stonepeak, Bernhard)
Run 1 free DD report as sample for warm lead
Define exact deliverable: scope, timeline, price ($4-5K/report)
Create 1-page PDF service menu (DD report, retainer, API access)
Book 5 discovery calls with PE/infrastructure firms
Close 1 paid engagement ($4-5K)
Set up invoicing (Stripe or PayPal)

Ask for referrals from first client
Launch Developer Scorecard with email gate
Post 1 LinkedIn article/week showcasing data insights
Send 20 more targeted outreach emails
Build case study from first engagement
Raise price to $6-8K/report
Sign 2 more clients
Productize DD report ‚Äî templated, faster to produce
Launch Prospector Labs API paid tier
Hire VA or part-time analyst for data cleaning
Build 'Prospector Labs Weekly' email newsletter
Speak at 1 energy/infrastructure event or podcast
5+ clients on retainer
API revenue supplementing consulting
10+ clients across PE, developers, utilities
Considering first full-time hire
Personal brand driving 50%+ of leads
Exploring adjacent data verticals

goals.title: Elite Physical Health
goals.target: Greek God physique by Aug 2026, Hyrox #2 by June
goals.doneDef: Visible abs, 210-215 lbs lean, 6-day training split, bloodwork optimized

phases.name: Foundation Reset
phases.milestone: Consistent 6-day split, nutrition dialed, bloodwork done

actions.text: Get bloodwork done (testosterone, thyroid, metabolic panel)
Lock in training split (PPL 2x or Upper/Lower/Hyrox)
Track macros for 2 weeks ‚Äî establish baseline
Set protein target: 1g/lb bodyweight daily
Morning routine: breathwork ‚Üí stretch ‚Üí gym by 6:30am
Research Cialis Rx
Sign up for next Hyrox event (May/June)

phases.name: Dial In
phases.milestone: Visible progress, strength PRs, Hyrox training active

actions.text: Progressive overload ‚Äî track all lifts weekly
Add 1 Hyrox-specific session/week
Sleep: 10:30pm-5:30am non-negotiable
Supplement stack optimized from bloodwork
Cut if needed ‚Äî 500 cal deficit, protein high
Complete Hyrox #2 with Mitchell ‚Äî beat Vegas time
Document the transformation (photos)
Find sustainable maintenance routine

goals.title: Deep Relationships & Confidence
goals.target: Meaningful relationship by Sept 2026, family connected, sexually confident
goals.doneDef: Dating someone I'm excited about, calling family weekly, ED/PE anxiety resolved

phases.name: Foundation
phases.milestone: Bloodwork done, Cialis Rx, 1 honest conversation/day

actions.text: Get bloodwork done
Talk to doctor about Cialis
Start edging practice 3x/week
Read 'Way of the Superior Man' ‚Äî 20 pages/day
Call Mitchell 1x/week
Call half-sister 2x/month
1 honest conversation/day
Stop performing success ‚Äî be real with friends
Go on 2+ dates/month
Practice kegels + breathwork during intimacy
Have the vulnerable conversation early with dates
Join 1 social activity/group in NYC
Reach out to 2 old friends/month

phases.name: Depth
phases.milestone: Dating someone consistently, family relationships strong

actions.text: Invest in someone ‚Äî go deep
Visit family (Denver or Boston)
Build social life beyond work

goals.title: Mental Operating System
goals.target: Calm mind + full speed as DEFAULT state
goals.doneDef: Daily practices automatic, avoidance managed, no invisible weight

phases.name: Install the System
phases.milestone: 21-day morning + evening streak, inbox zero daily

actions.text: Morning: breathwork (10min) ‚Üí journal (5min) ‚Üí gym ‚Üí frog before 9am
Evening: 5-min reflection ‚Üí plan tomorrow ‚Üí bed by 10:30
2-minute sweep 3x/day (reply to every text/email/DM)
Name avoidance pattern in real-time
Weekly brain dump every Sunday ‚Üí OPEN-LOOPS.md
Mission Control check every morning ‚Äî know top 3 tasks
Find journaling format that sticks (voice memo? 3 bullets?)
Review and prune: what's working, what's not
Meditate 15min/day (up from 10)
Monthly life audit: living aligned with the vision?
Teach someone what you've learned
Stress fuels you instead of derailing you
Vision feels like present tense, not future
